comment: WORST PROFESSOR ALIVE! Did not grade a single assignment and did not input grades until several months after the semester concluded, leaving my grade as incomplete in Owlexpress. Do not take him if you care about your grades or actually want to learn something.

It is pathetic and sad that it is practically a week before grades have to be entered and the entire class has no idea their grades at all for any of the 8 labs. I wish I could say what I got in the class, but have absolutely no idea. He constantly makes excuses for his own disorganization. Can't imagine what it would be like to take a lecture.

Professor was passionate about the subject but overall reached to his own experience. Never responded or cared it seems the second he leaves the room. In such crucial subjects to learn, you will finish the class not knowing much and learning very little from him. Search for other professors first!

Easily the worst lab professor I've ever taken. Have not received a grade for any lab throughout the semester (at time of writing, it's finals week) nor received a response to any of the numerous emails I've sent him. Just dumped two labs on us during finals week after neglecting to send anything since the school was shut down. Don't take for lab.

One of the most disorganized professors I have ever taken. Will not respond to any emails or text messages from the many forms of communication he gives you. Expect to get grades back weeks to months later. Does not teach theory or direct materials but rather his own experience. Very confusing at times with material. Look for other professors first

McClain utilizes this class to be a representation of what he does at work. He teaches the practical side of hydrology and less theory. Tests aren't that hard if you pay attention in class and he usually will emphasize what is on the tests. He does give pop quizzes but they're super easy if you just listen to what he says the class before.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor McClain structured this course to follow what he does in his job. His lectures are thorough and very interesting. He does an excellent job teaching the material. He doesn't give many HWs or quizzes, but they are straightforward. 3 tests, and does a review for each test the class before. No outside office hours until you start the project.

In general, a disorganized prof that cares. Pop quizzes are not difficult if u show up to class. He doesn't have many handouts or slides, feels like he just wings it in lecture. He is repetitive over things he'll put in the test. Very unclear grading system, completion primarily for any assignments even group project. Opt out of final for group pro
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Great professor. Examples hard to follow sometimes, but McClain always welcomes questions. 2-3 exams and a final project not bad. Gives plenty of time for homework & grades for completion only; easy going; accepts late work.
